item.title: Trump says 'a lot' of federal workers are being laid off during government shutdown
item.description: The Trump administration and Republicans have sought to blame Democrats for the government shutdown, and any negative fallout from it.

item.title: Blast destroys Tennessee munitions plant; 18 missing and feared dead

item.title: Trump puts extra 100% tariff on China imports, adds export controls on 'critical software'

item.title: Trump nominee Paul Ingrassia reportedly accused of sexual harassment
item.description: Paul Ingrassia, Trump's nominee to lead the Office of Special Counsel, has been accused of sexual harassment, according to a report from Politico.
